# webPlugInMainResourceDidFinishLoading()

**Instance Method**

Invoked when the connection successfully finishes loading data.

## Declaration

```swift
func webPlugInMainResourceDidFinishLoading()
```

## Discussion

This message is invoked when the `WebPlugInShouldLoadMainResourceKey` plug-in command-line argument is set to [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO] and the underlying `NSURLConnection` object for the main resource sends the connectionDidFinishLoading: message to its delegate.

## Main resource messages

- **webPlugInMainResourceDidFailWithError(_:)**: Invoked when an error occurs loading the main resource.
- **webPlugInMainResourceDidReceive(_:)**: Invoked when the connection loads data incrementally.
- **webPlugInMainResourceDidReceive(_:)**: Invoked when the connection receives sufficient data to construct the URL response for its request.
